relation: Great for these types of students
Never have I felt threatened while on campus.
A lot of Greek fraternities and sororities.
It's Topeka, Kansas. Don't expect much.
The Union's food is just...meh. Edible.
It's definitely intellectually challenging and engaging here, but not the the point where one couldn't maintain a steady job and still take 12-15 hours of classes.
Getting registered here is tricky sometimes, but the easiest way to do it it to go to Morgan Hall on 17th street and go to the registrar's office.

It's a personable, localized college where teachers value learning over pass/fail rates. The academic advisors are all available at the convenience of the student. I really have been able to develop personal relationships with my professors, who have proven to actually be invested in my education!
pageTitle: Washburn University Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {8102=Washburn is ranked in the top 10 of the 2010 U.S. News and World Report America's Best Colleges. It is a great business school. I have enjoyed all my business classes and teachers, and they are teaching me a lot., 203345=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 126455=Washburn does not have control of their classes and for someone with high anxiety it causes problems in the ability for me to pay attention when other students are talking during a lecture. I have such a low GPA the semester of Spring 2013 because the student medical service told me I had a blood fungus which my job said I could not work till it was cleared up; upon getting health Insurance I went to a different doctor and they said that was not the case; I was unable to get to many of my classes due to no funds for gas. I am taking online classes because their information taught in the classes is good information so I hope that online classes will allow me to do better work.}

textAfterTable: Tips for prospective students Make sure you are prepared with specific questions that you need answered and don't be shy. you won't get any help if your shy. there are many people around campus who want to help you, so let them. Bang for the buck It is actually really reasonable considering how much college can be Am enjoying being here I absolutely love the school. it's my perfect fit. Am learning a lot Like any university you have to work for your grades the professors won't just give them to you like my experience in high school.
